statements: SELECT * FROM yoga_members;
SELECT name, contact_details FROM yoga_members WHERE membership_status = 'active';
SELECT member_id, name FROM yoga_members WHERE member_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM yoga_members WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT name, membership_status FROM yoga_members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM yoga_members WHERE membership_status = 'active';
SELECT name, contact_details FROM yoga_members WHERE membership_status = 'expired';
SELECT * FROM yoga_members ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name FROM yoga_members WHERE member_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT member_id, name, contact_details FROM yoga_members WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT full_name, email FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'active';
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_time FROM classes ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, membership_status FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'expired';
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT full_name, email FROM members WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM members WHERE member_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, membership_status FROM members WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' AND membership_status = 'Inactive';
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT name, membership_status FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT class_name, class_date, class_time FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT name, contact_details FROM members WHERE member_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT attendance_id, member_id, class_id, attendance_date FROM attendance WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT name, membership_status FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT member_id, name, contact_details FROM members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_date, class_time FROM class_schedule WHERE class_date = '2022-01-20';

SELECT members.name, class_schedule.class_name, attendance.attendance_date FROM members JOIN attendance ON members.member_id = attendance.member_id JOIN class_schedule ON attendance.class_id = class_schedule.class_id;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT member_id, first_name, membership_status FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_time FROM classes WHERE max_capacity > 10;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_time FROM classes WHERE max_capacity >= 20 ORDER BY class_time DESC;

SELECT m.first_name, m.last_name, c.class_name, p.amount FROM members m INNER JOIN memberships ms ON m.member_id = ms.member_id INNER JOIN classes c ON ms.class_id = c.class_id INNER JOIN payments p ON ms.membership_id = p.membership_id WHERE p.amount > 50;

SELECT DISTINCT m.first_name, m.last_name, c.class_name, p.payment_date FROM members m INNER JOIN memberships ms ON m.member_id = ms.member_id INNER JOIN classes c ON ms.class_id = c.class_id INNER JOIN payments p ON ms.membership_id = p.membership_id WHERE p.payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT name, email FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'active';
SELECT class_name, class_date, class_time FROM classes WHERE class_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructor_id, name FROM instructors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT member_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100.00;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM members ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email, payment_amount FROM members INNER JOIN payments ON members.member_id = payments.member_id WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructors.name AS instructor_name, classes.class_name, classes.class_date, classes.class_time FROM instructors JOIN classes ON instructors.instructor_id = classes.instructor_id;
SELECT members.name AS member_name, memberships.start_date, memberships.end_date FROM members INNER JOIN memberships ON members.member_id = memberships.member_id WHERE memberships.end_date IS NULL;
